casebody.data:
IN RE Application of DUKE ENERGY OHIO, INC. 2018-0973 Supreme Court of Ohio. March 13, 2019

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULING

Sua sponte, appellant ordered to show cause within seven days why its appeal should not be dismissed as moot in light of the commission's approval of Duke Energy Ohio, Inc.'s fourth electric security plan on December 19, 2018. Appellee and intervening appellee may file responses within seven days of appellant's response.
